page.title: 12 CLUBS
page.content: The Hall Green area is very well off for clubs.They range from Belly Dancing in Highfield Hall to a tennis club on Petersfield Road.A lot of clubs are held in a local community centre called Highfield Hall.Other clubs are held in places such as Friends Meeting House,Hall Green Library and local church halls.Old people's clubs are held in a place called F.I.R.Cones.A lot of clubs such as Brownies,Cubs,Scouts,Sea Scouts,Sea Rangers etc.are held in the Hall Green area.Various wildlife and Nature clubs are also held in places such as Hall Green Library.The most popular type of sports club in Hall Green is badminton.There are four clubs for the sport.There are some clubs for one sex such as Men's Fellowship Club.There is one political club,Hall Green Conservative and Unionist Club.
